benchmark_details.name: ArCOV19- Rumors
benchmark_details.overview: ArCOV19- Rumors is an Arabic COVID-19 Twitter dataset for misinformation detection comprising tweets from January 27th to April 2020, including 138 verified claims and 9.4K annotated tweets for both claim-level and tweet-level verification tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate research on misinformation detection on social media during the COVID-19 pandemic through a manually-annotated Arabic dataset.

data.source: Tweets collected from Twitter containing claims related to COVID-19.
data.annotation: Manual annotation for tweets to determine veracity.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated according to standard practices in classification tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy measures the correctness of predictions; F1 Score balances precision and recall.
methodology.baseline_results: Bi-GCN model achieved 0.669 accuracy, MARBERT achieved 0.757 accuracy.
methodology.validation: Data was split into folds for cross-validation.
